column3: “One of the best strains I have had in a long time. Not only is it strong. But the taste of citrus and hints of flowery niceness. Almost has a sweetness to it as well. And some other herbal after favors that slowly creep in after exhale!. And the medical and even recreational effects are beyond amazing I would recommend this to anyone with pain issues because the pain relief of this strain is beyond oxycodone even. Th...”

“By far an awesome strain.  I've recently had surgery and have severe pain. I was prescribed oxycodone which did not work at all. This strain is great for pain! I also suffer from migraines which this strain takes away all the pain quickly! It surpasses high powered  pain killers! That's a winner!”

“This is an amazing smoke. A little goes a long way in regards to high you are trying to get. I'd give this too thumbs up right now, but it seems like a lot of work.
I am also totally pain free for the first time in days! I will be buying more ASAP!”

“This is a deep couch locked hitter. Use with caution too much and you will be passed out lol great for movies rainy days and music . Not for social settings  unless you wanna just watch like a zombie lol.  Great over all body and Head high you will melt your day away with this   Hits great as a vape one of my favorite end of the night strains enjoy !”
“had me and the friends on the couch for hours watching parks and rec”
“Have been chillin on this flavor for a while and I feel like it never hits my tolerance. Top shelf grade A+ stuff primo.”
“Chill couch lock strain, good for listening to music and playing games.”
“Tasty and aromatic. Slow and creeping. Wowie! One of my top favs!”
“Chill couch lock strain, good for listening to music and playing games.”

“Thanks to private reserve in WA I got to try some pink panties.
Looks frosty great. Shades of light green, blues, purples, and the shades of pink. Name sakes there by the look. Aroma is unique and makes a pothead do a double smell. It’s like potpourri. Spicy flowers and hints dried dark fruit. Even a rubbery plastic in the mix too. Tastes like dried fruit and flowers. Effects are great for night time I felt like a ha...”

“Pink panties is a really flowery smoke with a decent, relaxing high, perfect for winding down. It does give me a slight headache though, which I assume is blood pressure fluctuations. Overall, I would recommend it!”
“Great strain to just watch some movies and series.”

“It feels like I could read the dictionary on this or jerk off and sleep.  It has a very floral and fruity smell and it smokes like velvet.  Numbs me up good and keeps me mentally relaxed by mildly stimulated.  I recommend for Indica lovers.”
“Used before sleep after chorus. Good back pain relief, relaxed and a tad sleepy.”
“Melted stress, anxiety and depression away. Chill and not too foggy”
